Name: Dinner with an Owl
About the game: Dinner with an Owl is a short classical point and click adventure. Explore the sinister mansion of your eccentric owl-like host, who holds his involuntary guests under a puzzling spell. Can you help them escape this nightmare? Then brace yourselves for some serious surprises! This is the enhanced 'Dessert Edition' of Dinner with an Owl, featuring: Full professional voice acting Eerie original soundtrack Twisted, looping storyline Classic point and click adventure gameplay Talk to weird characters in multiple choice dialogues Solve the mystery of the owl, to finally escape the mansion
